title: Tea Caddy
marks:
Mark

Unidentified family crest in oval cartouch
description: tea caddy, straight sided oval body with flat hinged lid and woved finial, body engraved with floral swags supporting oval framed cartouches, one cartouche engraved with unidentified family crest; fitted with lock and key; fully marked on underside; marked with lion passant underside
creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his family and friends
